Package com.caissemagasin.service

Class OrderService

java.lang.Object
com.caissemagasin.service.OrderService
public class OrderService extends Object
Service class for managing orders and products. Provides methods to create new orders, search for products, finalize orders, and retrieve orders by ID.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs an OrderService instance with the specified order and product repositories.

    • OrderService

      public OrderService(OrderRepository orderRepository, ProductRepository productRepository)
      Constructs an OrderService instance with the specified order and product repositories.
      Parameters:
      orderRepository - the repository responsible for managing orders
      productRepository - the repository responsible for managing products

  • Method Details

    • createNewOrder

      public Order createNewOrder()
      Creates a new order with the next available order ID.
      Returns:
      a new Order object with the next order ID

    • searchProducts

      public Map<String,?> searchProducts(String keyword, int page, int pageSize)
      Searches for products based on a keyword, with pagination support.
      Parameters:
      keyword - the keyword to search for in product names
      page - the page number for pagination (starting from 0)
      pageSize - the number of products per page
      Returns:
      a map containing the list of products found and the total number of products matching the keyword

    • getProductById

      public Product getProductById(int id)
      Retrieves a product by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the product to retrieve
      Returns:
      the product if found, null otherwise

    • finalizeOrder

      public boolean finalizeOrder(Order order, User user)
      Finalizes an order by saving it through the order repository.
      Parameters:
      order - the order to be finalized
      user - the user who is finalizing the order
      Returns:
      true if the order was successfully saved, false otherwise

    • searchOrder

      public String searchOrder(String id)
      Searches for an order by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the order to search for
      Returns:
      the order details as a string if found, null otherwise
